original_text: Here a dinner was given in Jesus’ honor. Martha served, while Lazarus was among those reclining at the table with him.
korean_text: 거기서 예수를 위하여 잔치할새 마르다는 일을 하고 나사로는 예수와 함께 앉은 자 중에 있더라

sentences.original_text: Here a dinner was given in Jesus' honor.
while Lazarus was among those reclining at the table
sentences.korean_translation: 라자로는 식탁에 함께 앉아있는 사람들 중에 있었습니다.
